name: Burnout (itch) (loony_moth)
description:
It's the end of the world as we know it!

Choose your response to each weekly event, and balance the four horseman so that the world ends right on schedule.

Inspired by the game Reigns

Written using Godot 3.2.3

Music by TallBeard made for Ludum Dare 28

UI SFX from Kenny Game Assets 3
